TopicTitle: portable VAB and Launch pad for mun bases

Articles.Content:
That's on the What not to suggest list

More specific: Orbital construction and construction on other celestials
I dont think so. It only will be another part that you will use to create a flat area where you can land a transport safely! I think that it could be a good idea.

what i would like to have is the ability to bond objects to the surface. i will build my landing area and take it with me to the mun but its pointles cos every parts but wheels are falling into the planet...
